mapper.update:
UPDATE iptv_res_ver
name = #{name},
country = #{country},
sposter = #{sposter},
bposter = #{bposter},
keyword = #{keyword},
sort = #{sort},
version_disable = #{version_disable},
link_prid = #{link_prid},
link_crid = #{link_crid},
layout_start = #{layout_start},
layout_end = #{layout_end},
layout_line = #{layout_line},
layout_show_title = #{layout_show_title},
layout_show_child_title = #{layout_show_child_title},
layout_big = #{layout_big},
layout_regular = #{layout_regular},
WHERE vid=#{vid}
mapper.select: SELECT r2.rid,r2.test_vid,r2.prod_vid,r2.global_disable,r2.media_ok,r2.free,r2.type, ##### res v2.vid,v2.name,v2.version_disable,v2.layout_regular,r2.child_type, #### res-ver r1.test_vid link_test_vid,r1.prod_vid link_prod_vid,v1.rid link_rid,v1.vid link_vid,v1.version_disable link_version_disable,v1.link_prid,v1.link_crid ### link FROM iptv_res r0 INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (v1.link_prid=r0.rid) # find all sub-link INNER JOIN iptv_res r1 ON (v1.rid=r1.rid AND r1.test_vid=v1.vid AND (v1.version_disable=0 OR (v1.version_disable=1 AND r1.test_vid!=r1.prod_vid))) # find product link INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.rid=v1.link_crid) # find all ver INNER JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (v2.rid=r2.rid AND r2.test_vid=v2.vid AND r2.global_disable=0 AND r2.media_ok=1 AND (v2.version_disable=0 OR (v2.version_disable=1 AND r2.test_vid!=r2.prod_vid))) # find product ver WHERE r0.global_disable=0 AND r0.rid=#{prid} ORDER BY v1.sort ASC

choose.when: SELECT r1.test_vid link_test_vid,r1.prod_vid link_prod_vid, v1.vid link_vid,v1.rid link_rid,v1.bposter poster,v1.fposter,v1.sort,v1.version_disable,v1.layout_big,v1.layout_end,v1.layout_line,v1.layout_regular,v1.layout_show_child_title,v1.layout_big,v1.layout_show_title,v1.layout_start, r2.type,r2.child_type,r2.iptv_code1,r2.iptv_code2,r2.free,r2.global_disable,r2.media_definition,r2.media_lyric,r2.test_vid,r2.prod_vid,r2.play_time,r2.res_id, v2.*, r4.rid mv_rid, GROUP_CONCAT(v3.name) singer_name,r2.global_disable res_global_disable,r3.global_disable singer_global_disable FROM iptv_res r0 INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (v1.link_prid=r0.rid AND v1.version_disable=0) # find all link INNER JOIN iptv_res r1 ON (v1.rid=r1.rid AND r1.test_vid=v1.vid) # find test link INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.rid=v1.link_crid AND v2.version_disable=0) # find all ver INNER JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (v2.rid=r2.rid AND r2.test_vid=v2.vid AND r2.media_ok=1) # find test ver LEFT JOIN iptv_multi_singer s1 ON (s1.child_rid=r2.rid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r3 ON (r3.rid=s1.singer_rid) ### singer LEFT JOIN iptv_res_ver v3 ON (v3.vid=r3.test_vid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r4 ON (r4.music_id=r2.song_mv_id AND r4.type='mv' AND r4.media_ok=1 AND r4.global_disable=0) ### relate mv WHERE r0.global_disable=0 AND r0.rid=#{prid} GROUP BY r2.rid ORDER BY v1.sort ASC
choose.otherwise: SELECT r1.test_vid link_test_vid,r1.prod_vid link_prod_vid, v1.vid link_vid,v1.rid link_rid,v1.bposter poster,v1.fposter,v1.sort,v1.version_disable,v1.layout_big,v1.layout_end,v1.layout_line,v1.layout_regular,v1.layout_show_child_title,v1.layout_big,v1.layout_show_title,v1.layout_start, r2.type,r2.child_type,r2.iptv_code1,r2.iptv_code2,r2.free,r2.global_disable,r2.media_definition,r2.media_lyric,r2.test_vid,r2.prod_vid,r2.play_time,r2.res_id, v2.*, r4.rid mv_rid, GROUP_CONCAT(v3.name) singer_name,r2.global_disable res_global_disable,r3.global_disable singer_global_disable FROM iptv_res r0 INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (v1.link_prid=r0.rid AND v1.version_disable=0) # find all link INNER JOIN iptv_res r1 ON (v1.rid=r1.rid AND r1.prod_vid=v1.vid) # find test link INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.rid=v1.link_crid AND v2.version_disable=0) # find all ver INNER JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (v2.rid=r2.rid AND r2.prod_vid=v2.vid AND r2.media_ok=1) # find test ver LEFT JOIN iptv_multi_singer s1 ON (s1.child_rid=r2.rid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r3 ON (r3.rid=s1.singer_rid) ### singer LEFT JOIN iptv_res_ver v3 ON (v3.vid=r3.prod_vid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r4 ON (r4.music_id=r2.song_mv_id AND r4.type='mv' AND r4.media_ok=1 AND r4.global_disable=0) ### relate mv WHERE r0.global_disable=0 AND r0.rid=#{prid} GROUP BY r2.rid ORDER BY v1.sort ASC

choose.when: SELECT v1.vid,v1.rid,v1.name,v1.bposter,v1.sposter,r1.type,r1.test_vid,r1.prod_vid,v1.sort,r1.child_type,r1.free,r1.play_time,r1.res_id FROM iptv_res r1,iptv_res_ver v1 WHERE r1.test_vid=v1.vid AND r1.type=#{type} AND v1.version_disable=0 AND r1.global_disable=0 ORDER BY v1.sort ASC,v1.version_create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
choose.otherwise: SELECT v1.vid,v1.rid,v1.name,v1.bposter,v1.sposter,r1.type,r1.test_vid,r1.prod_vid,v1.sort,r1.child_type,r1.free,r1.play_time,r1.res_id FROM iptv_res r1,iptv_res_ver v1 WHERE r1.prod_vid=v1.vid AND r1.type=#{type} AND v1.version_disable=0 AND r1.global_disable=0 ORDER BY v1.sort ASC,v1.version_create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}

choose.otherwise: SELECT count(*) FROM iptv_res r1,iptv_res_ver v1 WHERE r1.prod_vid=v1.vid AND r1.type=#{type} AND v1.version_disable=0 AND r1.global_disable=0

mapper.select: SELECT v1.vid,v1.rid,v1.name,r1.type,r1.test_vid,r1.prod_vid,v1.sort,r1.child_type,r1.free,v1.version_disable FROM iptv_res r1,iptv_res_ver v1 WHERE r1.test_vid=v1.vid AND r1.type='layout' AND r1.global_disable=0 AND (v1.version_disable=0 OR (v1.version_disable=1 AND r1.test_vid!=r1.prod_vid)) ORDER BY v1.sort ASC

choose.when: SELECT r1.rid,v1.name,r1.type,r1.test_vid,r1.prod_vid,v1.sort,r1.child_type,r1.iptv_code1,r1.iptv_code2,r1.free,r1.media_lyric,v1.vid,v1.bposter,r1.play_time,r1.res_id, v1.sposter,GROUP_CONCAT(v2.name) singer_name,r3.rid mv_rid FROM iptv_res r1 # main res INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (r1.test_vid=v1.vid AND r1.global_disable=0 AND r1.media_ok=1) # main res-ver INNER JOIN iptv_multi_singer s1 ON (s1.child_rid=r1.rid) # join singer INNER JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (r2.rid=s1.singer_rid AND r2.global_disable=0) # join-singer-res INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.vid=r2.test_vid) # join-singer-res-ver LEFT JOIN iptv_res r3 ON (r3.music_id=r1.song_mv_id AND r3.type='mv' AND r3.media_ok=1 AND r3.global_disable=0) # related mv WHERE r1.type=#{type} AND r1.free=1 GROUP BY r1.rid ORDER BY v1.sort ASC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
choose.otherwise: SELECT r1.rid,v1.name,r1.type,r1.test_vid,r1.prod_vid,v1.sort,r1.child_type,r1.iptv_code1,r1.iptv_code2,r1.free,r1.media_lyric,v1.vid,v1.bposter,r1.play_time,r1.res_id, v1.sposter,GROUP_CONCAT(v2.name) singer_name,r3.rid mv_rid FROM iptv_res r1 # main res INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (r1.prod_vid=v1.vid AND r1.global_disable=0 AND r1.media_ok=1) # main res-ver INNER JOIN iptv_multi_singer s1 ON (s1.child_rid=r1.rid) # join singer INNER JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (r2.rid=s1.singer_rid AND r2.global_disable=0) # join-singer-res INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.vid=r2.prod_vid) # join-singer-res-ver LEFT JOIN iptv_res r3 ON (r3.music_id=r1.song_mv_id AND r3.type='mv' AND r3.media_ok=1 AND r3.global_disable=0 AND r3.prod_vid != 0) # wpq 去除未提交到正式版本的mv_id 2019年6月3日14:18:54 WHERE r1.type=#{type} AND r1.free=1 GROUP BY r1.rid ORDER BY v1.sort ASC LIMIT #{offset},#{size}

choose.when: SELECT count(1) FROM iptv_res r1,iptv_res_ver v1,iptv_multi_singer s1,iptv_res r2 WHERE r1.test_vid=v1.vid AND r1.type=#{type} AND v1.version_disable=0 AND r1.global_disable=0 AND r1.free=1 AND r1.media_ok=1 AND s1.child_rid=r1.rid AND r2.rid=s1.singer_rid AND r2.global_disable=0
choose.otherwise: SELECT count(1) FROM iptv_res r1,iptv_res_ver v1,iptv_multi_singer s1,iptv_res r2 WHERE r1.prod_vid=v1.vid AND r1.type=#{type} AND v1.version_disable=0 AND r1.global_disable=0 AND r1.free=1 AND r1.media_ok=1 AND s1.child_rid=r1.rid AND r2.rid=s1.singer_rid AND r2.global_disable=0

choose.when: SELECT v1.*,r1.*,GROUP_CONCAT(v2.name) singer_name,r4.rid mv_rid,r2.rid singer_rid FROM iptv_res r1 INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (r1.rid=v1.rid AND v1.vid=r1.test_vid) LEFT JOIN iptv_multi_singer s1 ON (s1.child_rid=r1.rid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (r2.rid=s1.singer_rid AND r2.global_disable=0) # singer offline be empty LEFT JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.vid=r2.test_vid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r4 ON (r4.music_id=r1.song_mv_id AND r4.type='mv' AND r4.media_ok=1 AND r4.global_disable=0) WHERE r1.media_ok=1 AND r1.global_disable=0 AND r1.rid=#{rid} AND r1.type=#{type} # res must enable GROUP BY r1.rid
choose.otherwise: SELECT v1.*,r1.*,GROUP_CONCAT(v2.name) singer_name,r4.rid mv_rid,r2.rid singer_rid FROM iptv_res r1 INNER JOIN iptv_res_ver v1 ON (r1.rid=v1.rid AND v1.vid=r1.prod_vid) LEFT JOIN iptv_multi_singer s1 ON (s1.child_rid=r1.rid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (r2.rid=s1.singer_rid AND r2.global_disable=0) LEFT JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.vid=r2.prod_vid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r4 ON (r4.music_id=r1.song_mv_id AND r4.type='mv' AND r4.media_ok=1 AND r4.global_disable=0 AND r4.prod_vid != 0) # wpq 去除未提交到正式版本的mv_id 2019年6月3日14:18:54 WHERE r1.media_ok=1 AND r1.global_disable=0 AND r1.rid=#{rid} AND r1.type=#{type} GROUP BY r1.rid

mapper.select: SELECT v2.name,v.vid,v.rid,r2.child_type,v.layout_regular,v.link_crid,v.link_prid FROM iptv_res_ver v JOIN iptv_res r ON r.rid = v.rid JOIN iptv_res r2 ON v.link_crid = r2.rid JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON v.link_crid= v2.rid WHERE v.link_prid = #{rid} AND r.type = 'link'
SELECT v.rid FROM iptv_res_ver v WHERE v.link_prid=#{prid} AND v.link_crid=#{crid} LIMIT 1

choose.when: SELECT r1.rid,r1.type,r1.iptv_code1,r1.iptv_code2,r1.media_lyric,r1.free,r1.play_time,r1.res_id,v1.name,v1.bposter,v1.sposter,GROUP_CONCAT(v2.name) singer_name,r3.rid mv_rid FROM iptv_res_ver v1 INNER JOIN iptv_res r1 ON (v1.rid=r1.rid AND r1.test_vid=v1.vid AND v1.version_disable=0) LEFT JOIN iptv_multi_singer s1 ON (s1.child_rid=r1.rid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (r2.rid=s1.singer_rid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.vid=r2.test_vid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r3 ON (r3.music_id=r1.song_mv_id AND r3.type='mv' AND r3.media_ok=1 AND r3.global_disable=0) WHERE v1.vid IN #{item} GROUP BY r1.rid
choose.otherwise: SELECT r1.rid,r1.type,r1.iptv_code1,r1.iptv_code2,r1.media_lyric,r1.free,r1.play_time,r1.res_id,v1.name,v1.bposter,v1.sposter,GROUP_CONCAT(v2.name) singer_name,r3.rid mv_rid FROM iptv_res_ver v1 INNER JOIN iptv_res r1 ON (v1.rid=r1.rid AND r1.prod_vid=v1.vid AND v1.version_disable=0) LEFT JOIN iptv_multi_singer s1 ON (s1.child_rid=r1.rid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r2 ON (r2.rid=s1.singer_rid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res_ver v2 ON (v2.vid=r2.test_vid) LEFT JOIN iptv_res r3 ON (r3.music_id=r1.song_mv_id AND r3.type='mv' AND r3.media_ok=1 AND r3.global_disable=0 AND r3.prod_vid != 0) # wpq 去除未提交到正式版本的mv_id 2019年6月3日14:18:54 WHERE v1.vid IN #{item} GROUP BY r1.rid
